Services by Island Tile

Professional & Friendly Experts

Interiors by Island Tile offers expert advice for any residential or commerical renovation or new construction build. With 30 years of experience, you can trust that Island Tile has built excellent relationships with the best national flooring brands to ensure quality product and warranty protection. Their wide product selection offers designs arriving regularly, there truly is something for everyone.

Island Tile is a licensed, bonded and insured General Contractor, offering the following services

Professional Measurements

for a variety of spaces

Custom Fabricated Countertops

including a wide range of sink mounts

Installation Services Including:

Blinds

Countertops

Hardwood

Laminate

Vinyl

Carpet
